verses.text: \w There|strong="G1161"\w* were \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w season|strong="G2540"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* that \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w Galilæans|strong="G1057"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* had \w mingled|strong="G3396"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w*.

¶ He \w spake|strong="G3004"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w parable|strong="G3850"\w*; \wj  \+w A certain|strong="G5100"\+w* \+add man\+add* \+w had|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w a fig tree|strong="G4808"\+w* \+w planted|strong="G5452"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he came|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w and sought|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w thereon|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w found|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w none|strong="G3756"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Then|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w said he|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the dresser of his vineyard|strong="G0289"\+w*, \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w these three|strong="G5140"\+w* \+w years|strong="G2094"\+w* \+w I come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w seeking|strong="G2212"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w fig tree|strong="G4808"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w none|strong="G3756"\+w*: \+w cut|strong="G1581"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w down|strong="G1581"\+w*; \+w why|strong="G2444"\+w* \+w cumbereth|strong="G2673"\+w* \+w it|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w the ground|strong="G1093"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he answering|strong="G0611"\+w* \+w said|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*, \+w let|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w alone|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w year|strong="G2094"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w till|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w I shall dig|strong="G4626"\+w* \+w about|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w dung|strong="G2874"\+w* \+add it\+add*:\wj*

\wj  \+w And if|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w it bear|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w fruit|strong="G2590"\+w*, \+add well\+add*: \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w if|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*, \+add then\+add* \+w after that|strong="G3195"\+w* \+w thou shalt cut|strong="G1581"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w down|strong="G1581"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* which \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w infirmity|strong="G0769"\w* \w eighteen|strong="G1176"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* bowed \w together|strong="G4794"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w wise|strong="G3838"\w* lift \w up|strong="G0352"\w* \add herself\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w called|strong="G4377"\w* \add her to him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Woman|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w thou art loosed|strong="G0630"\+w* \+w from thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w infirmity|strong="G0769"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \add his\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w her|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G3916"\w* she was made \w straight|strong="G0461"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the ruler of the \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* with \w indignation|strong="G0023"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* that \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* on the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*, and \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, There \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* which \w men|strong="G3739"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w work|strong="G2038"\w*: \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3778"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* and be \w healed|strong="G2323"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+add Thou\+add* \+w hypocrite|strong="G5273"\+w*, \+w doth|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w each one|strong="G1538"\+w* \+w of you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w on the sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w loose|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w ox|strong="G1016"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w ass|strong="G3688"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the stall|strong="G5336"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w lead|strong="G0520"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w away|strong="G0520"\+w* \+w to watering|strong="G4222"\+w*?\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* said \w he|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w Unto what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w like|strong="G3664"\+w*? \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w whereunto|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w shall I resemble|strong="G3666"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj*
